home.welcomeDescription: I specialize in creating <selection>responsive</selection> and <selection>functional</selection> websites to help businesses achieve <selection>success</selection>.

projects.title: What I've Built
projects.description: Here are some of the projects I have worked on that showcase my skills in web and mobile development.

converterFilesTool.title: Converter Files Tool
converterFilesTool.description: A web application for converting files to various formats supported by FFmpeg. The user can upload a file and select the desired format for conversion. The system processes the files on the server and returns the finished result.
converterFilesTool.ariaLabel: Converter Files Tool - A web application for converting files to various formats supported by FFmpeg.

detectingFoodAI.title: Detecting Food (AI)
detectingFoodAI.description: An AI-powered application that identifies food items in images. Users can upload photos, and the system uses machine learning to recognize and classify different types of food, providing nutritional information and suggestions.
detectingFoodAI.ariaLabel: Detecting Food (AI) - An AI-powered application that identifies food items in images.

carPlateRecognition.title: Car Plate Recognition (AI)
carPlateRecognition.description: An AI-based tool that recognizes and extracts information from car license plates in images. It can be used for various applications, including parking management and traffic monitoring.
carPlateRecognition.ariaLabel: Car Plate Recognition (AI) - An AI-based tool that recognizes and extracts information from car license plates in images.

currencyConverter.title: Currency Converter
currencyConverter.description: A mobile application that allows users to convert currencies in real-time using the latest exchange rates. It supports multiple currencies and provides a user-friendly interface.
currencyConverter.ariaLabel: Currency Converter - A mobile application for real-time currency conversion.

mediaCompressor.title: Media Compressor Tool
mediaCompressor.description: A Windows tool for compressing media files, including images and videos, to reduce their size without significant loss of quality. It supports various formats and provides options for adjusting compression levels.
mediaCompressor.ariaLabel: Media Compressor Tool - A Windows tool for compressing media files.

climateVisualizationPlatform.title: Climate Visualization Platform
climateVisualizationPlatform.description: A collaborative project with a team of 2, where we developed a website featuring a map displaying temperature readings from multiple measuring stations, isolines, and the temperature gradient.
climateVisualizationPlatform.ariaLabel: Climate Visualization Platform - A collaborative project featuring a map displaying temperature readings and isolines.

RockPaperScissors.title: Rock Paper Scissors Game
RockPaperScissors.description: A simple web-based game where users can play Rock Paper Scissors against the computer. It features a user-friendly interface and keeps track of scores.
RockPaperScissors.ariaLabel: Rock Paper Scissors Game - A simple web-based game to play against the computer.

FantasyFootball.title: Fantasy Football
FantasyFootball.description: Fantasy Football is a visually appealing single-page web application that presents the concept of fantasy football. It encourages players to create teams, analyze football player performance, and compete with others.
FantasyFootball.ariaLabel: Fantasy Football - A visually appealing single-page web application for fantasy football.

skills.title: What I Know
skills.description: Here are the technologies and tools I use to create efficient and user-friendly solutions.

about.title: Who I Am
about.description: Here I will tell you a little about myself.
about.details: <paragraph>I’m <bold>Vladyslav Yarmolyuk,</bold> a <bold>passionate web developer</bold> from Kyiv, Ukraine, with over <bold>3 years of experience</bold> studying and practicing modern web development. I focus on building <bold>responsive, functional, and user-friendly</bold> websites that solve real-world problems.</paragraph><break /><paragraph> I’m always excited to explore <bold>new technologies</bold> and continuously learn to create better and more <bold>innovative IT solutions</bold>. My goal is to deliver <bold>high-quality digital products</bold> that not only meet but exceed user expectations. </paragraph>

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Feel free to reach out for collaborations, inquiries, or just a friendly chat.
